description.en:
Themis — A Distributed Oracle Solution

Themis is able to offer a couple of services according to the demand and different scenarios, including random number oracle, on-chain multi-assets oracle as well as computational oracle. 

Users can participate in liquidity mining by depositing MIS. Themis provides a whole set of technical solutions, including depositing assets to become the data provider,  anti-attack network, data verification, Themis VRF, arbitration and incentives.
